languages.text: {n}Механические руки скульптора пронизаны липкими трубками, локтевые сочленения истерлись. Эти импланты не обслуживали с десяток лет — такая халатность может серьезно угрожать здоровью носителя. Но кожа старика на месте соединения с железом выглядит розовой и здоровой.{/n}

{n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced. Such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life, and yet, the old man's skin looks relatively healthy in the spots where flesh and metal meet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Механические руки скульптора пронизаны липкими трубками, локтевые сочленения истерлись. Эти импланты не обслуживали с десяток лет — такая халатность может серьезно угрожать здоровью носителя. Но кожа старика на месте соединения с железом выглядит розовой и здоровой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced — such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life. And yet, the old man's skin looks healthy in places where flesh and metal meet.{/n}

{n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced — such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life. And yet, the old man's skin looks healthy in places where flesh and metal meet.{/n}

{n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced. Such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life, and yet, the old man's skin looks quite healthy in the spots where flesh and metal meet.{/n}

{n}The sculptor's mechanical hands are pierced by tubes sticky with age — they must be at least a hundred years old. And yet the violet sapphirion in place of his eyes seems practically new and perfectly grafted into his eye sockets. This man looks at once like a dilapidated wreck and the most advanced marvel on this planet.{/n}

{n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced. Such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life, and yet, the old man's skin looks relatively healthy in the spots where flesh and metal meet.{/n}

{n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced. Such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life, and yet, the old man's skin looks relatively healthy in the spots where flesh and metal meet.{/n}

{n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced. Such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life, and yet, the old man's skin looks quite healthy in the spots where flesh and metal meet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}雕刻家的机械手臂上布满了黏糊糊的管子，肘关节也几乎磨损殆尽。这些植入物肯定至少十年没维护过了。缺乏维护的植入物常常会对佩戴者的健康造成严重威胁，然而，这位老人肉体与金属接触的部分，看起来依然保持着较为健康的状态。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced. Such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life, and yet, the old man's skin looks relatively healthy in the spots where flesh and metal meet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}雕刻家的机械手臂上布满了黏糊糊的管子，肘关节也几乎磨损殆尽。这些植入物肯定至少十年没维护过了。缺乏维护的植入物常常会对佩戴者的健康造成严重威胁，然而，这位老人肉体与金属接触的部分，看起来依然保持着较为健康的状态。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unos tubos pegajosos atraviesan los brazos mecánicos del escultor, y las articulaciones de los codos están prácticamente desgastadas. Sus implantes deben de llevar por lo menos una década sin el debido mantenimiento. Esta falta de atención constituye a menudo una seria amenaza para la vida del usuario, y pese a ello la piel del anciano parece relativamente sana allí donde la carne y el metal se encuentran.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced. Such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life, and yet, the old man's skin looks relatively healthy in the spots where flesh and metal meet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unos tubos pegajosos atraviesan los brazos mecánicos del escultor, y las articulaciones de los codos están prácticamente desgastadas. Sus implantes deben de llevar por lo menos una década sin el debido mantenimiento. Esta falta de atención constituye a menudo una seria amenaza para la vida del usuario, y pese a ello la piel del anciano parece relativamente sana allí donde la carne y el metal se encuentran.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heykeltıraşın mekanik kolları, yapışkan tüplerce delinmiş; dirsek eklemleri de neredeyse tamamen aşınmış. Bu implantlar hizmetten kalkalı on yıl geçmiş olmalı. Böylesi bir ihmal, genellikle kişinin hayatına ciddi bir tehdit oluşturur ama yine de yaşlı adamın derisindeki et ve metalin birleştiği noktalar nispeten sağlıklı görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced. Such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life, and yet, the old man's skin looks relatively healthy in the spots where flesh and metal meet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heykeltıraşın mekanik kolları, yapışkan tüplerce delinmiş; dirsek eklemleri de neredeyse tamamen aşınmış. Bu implantlar hizmetten kalkalı on yıl geçmiş olmalı. Böylesi bir ihmal, genellikle kişinin hayatına ciddi bir tehdit oluşturur ama yine de yaşlı adamın derisindeki et ve metalin birleştiği noktalar nispeten sağlıklı görünüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彫刻家の機械的な腕には粘着質な管が貫通しており、肘の関節はほとんどすり減っている。これらのインプラントが最後に機能してから10年は経っているに違いない。そのように放置することは、人の命に深刻な脅威をもたらすことが多いが、その老人の皮膚は肉体と金属が接触する箇所の所々で比較的健康的なように見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced. Such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life, and yet, the old man's skin looks relatively healthy in the spots where flesh and metal meet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彫刻家の機械的な腕には粘着質な管が貫通しており、肘の関節はほとんどすり減っている。これらのインプラントが最後に機能してから10年は経っているに違いない。そのように放置することは、人の命に深刻な脅威をもたらすことが多いが、その老人の皮膚は肉体と金属が接触する箇所の所々で比較的健康的なように見える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les bras mécaniques du sculpteur sont parcourus de tubes collants et les articulations de ses coudes sont pratiquement élimées. Cela doit bien faire une décennie que ces implants n'ont pas été entretenus, une négligence qui, d'ordinaire, mettrait en danger la vie du porteur. Pourtant, la peau du vieil homme a l'air relativement saine là où la chair et le métal se rencontrent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical arms are pierced by sticky tubes, and the elbow joints have all but worn down. It must have been a decade since these implants were last serviced. Such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life, and yet, the old man's skin looks relatively healthy in the spots where flesh and metal meet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les bras mécaniques du sculpteur sont parcourus de tubes collants et les articulations de ses coudes sont pratiquement élimées. Cela doit bien faire une décennie que ces implants n'ont pas été entretenus, une négligence qui, d'ordinaire, mettrait en danger la vie du porteur. Pourtant, la peau du vieil homme a l'air relativement saine là où la chair et le métal se rencontrent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die mechanischen Arme des Skulpteurs bestehen aus klebrigen Röhren, die Ellbogengelenke sind extrem abgenutzt. Diese Implantate wurden garantiert seit mehr als zehn Jahren nicht mehr gewartet. Eine solche Vernachlässigung stellt oft eine echte Lebensgefahr dar, und doch wirkt die Haut des Alten an den Stellen, an denen Fleisch und Metall aufeinandertreffen, relativ gesund.{/n}

Such neglect often poses a serious threat to the person's life, and yet, the old man's skin looks relatively healthy in the spots where flesh and metal meet.{/n}
